thread.title: Drake Drops “Hotline Bling” Video On Apple Music
thread.title_full: Drake Drops “Hotline Bling” Video On Apple Music

title: Drake Drops “Hotline Bling” Video On Apple Music
text: Drake Drops “Hotline Bling” Video On Apple Music Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) As promise, Drake delivers the video for “Hotline Bling” video tonight, via Apple Music. Watch the Director X video below. That is all. Oh yeah, Drizzy’s new album, Views From The 6, sometime before the year is up, most likely. Please, hit us with those Drake dancing gifs sooner than later. Thank you in advance. […] The post Drake Drops “Hotline Bling” Video On Apple Music appeared first on Hip-Hop Wired.
